creator: kars.arnout.blom@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 32225
patch

XWPFStyles.setStyles doesn't maintain the inner list "listStyle" while addStyle does. This results in methods like styleExists not to work after calling setStyles.

creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: Thanks for the Patch, this is applied as r1646742 and will appear in the release after 3.11.
